0.4.2.name: wordpress/gloss
0.4.2.description:
A simple plugin that allows you to create a any number of glossaries. You can then add terms to each glossary (in no specific order) and add a particular glossary to a post or page.

This is still a Beta, so any testing feedback would be fantastic.
